111.content:
Hi,

My name is Rusty Hashburger. I'm 10 years old and am about to start middle school next school year. Or I was suppose to start middle school next school year. That is what I thought when 5th grade ended June 14th. 6th grade was suppose to start August 22nd, a Monday, the week before Labor Day. I was expecting to have a great summer goofing off with my friends and family. What else could a kid do but to goof off. But, now, I'm not technically a kid anymore and is expected to 'act like what I look like' by the time summer is over, by everyone, including my parents and siblings.

What am I suppose to do now? with how I have changed. People just think it is normal on how I changed but I still think it is weird.

11212.content:
as you wake up you feel odd
"John are you up yet?" yells your mother
"Yes!" you yell
"Are you sick honey?" she yells "No i feel fine!" you yell noting your voice sounds odd.
"You don't sound it I'm coming up!"
11212.title: odd morning

choices: Mom takes you shopping for clothes
112122.content:
"No Mom, I'm fine, really" you insist, "I just need to go to the bathroom", heading over to you bathroom.

In front of the toilet, you unzip your shorts, only something is wrong. Or rather something is gone.

Confused, you went over to the mirror, and something was wrong. It was not your reflection in the mirror. It was a girl's reflection.

Your mom hears you scream, shouting out that she's coming. Before you could tell her to go away, your mother is upstairs. However instead of her son, she sees a young girl.

"Sweety!!! What happened to you??!!!" she says

You have no answer, instead you fall to your knees and cry (not able to deal with such a drastic change). Your mother kneels down, hugging you tight in her arms to calm you down.

What happens next?
112122.title: you look in the mirror

1122.content: you wake up and feel strange. then you see you wet the bed that and your a girl?
1122.title: mental ar/tg

choices: Become the world's first alien cat bodybuilder.
Try and make it as a singing Sumo wrestler.
Prove to everyone you're a talking cat.
1123.content:
One day you notice something's very different about you, until it finally hits you like a wrecking ball knocking something down as you've transformed into a cat.

In this case Scratch from Space Cats the animated series that aired on NBC Saturday mornings nearly 25 years ago in 1991.

You then realize being an animated cat has its perks, as you could either become the world's first alien cat bodybuilder or possibly start your career as a singing Sumo wrestler or maybe you could an worldwide celebrity by proving to everyone you're a talking cat of some sort.

Now what will you do?
1123.title: Cat

choices: The two guys ask them to dance
Shawndy gets an admirer to ask her out
124.content:
Jennifer is a college student and she is in the pre-medicine program at Seattle College, where she is a straight A+ Student, She is going to be a surgeon.
She has a promising future. She lives with her best friend Shawndy, who is studying to become a psychiatrist. The two of them live in an apartment near the space needle. Jennifer has never been interested in dating and has never in her twenty years alive had a date. However Shawndy is just getting out of a relationship with a man who was emotionally abusive to her. She is having a difficult time learning to trust men again after her ex was so mean to her, he would call her names and bordered on physical abuse as he would throw things , yell, and lunge for Shawndy. Jennifer was so supportive of Shawndy, she allowed her to move in a few weeks ago. Shawndy had been living with Don her ex.

"I'm tired of studying, that's all we do, day and night"
said Jennifer.

"I know what you mean, Why don't we do something fun?" said Shawndy

"what can we do?"

"I know a bar close to Cedar Hospital."

"A bar?" said Jennifer with surprise.

"Yes, Why not?"

"I've never been to a bar before, have you?" Jennifer questioned.

"Of course I have. so do you want to or not, lets live a little bit."

"I guess it would be OK."

The two girls took a bus to the bar which was only a few blocks from their apartment building. The bar, called Denny's , was crowded with a hand full of people,The two girls went in and set down. The bartender came up to the girls and asked for their order. Jennifer was nervous, she wasn't used to being out accept when in school. Shawndy ordered a brandy, and Jennifer stumbled around not knowing what to order, the bartender told her he would bring her something special. He was smitten with the girls they were both very beautiful girls. Jennifer had blond hair, green eyes and she was very petite at 5'2. and Shawndy was light brown hair , hazel eyes, at 5'6. The two girls both had nice figures. So many men admired them unknown to them. A minute later the bartender brought Jennifer a drink called a hurricane. She took a sip and was pleased with it's taste. There was music playing on a juke box A song that Jennifer knew and loved . The two girls set at the bar talking while two guys at a table set and watched them.
124.title: Learning to cope

choices: Shawndy sees her ex in the bar
1243.content:
Jennifer was not reluctant to get up and start moving to the music. After a couple of drinks she thought Shawndy would also lighten up, but instead her emotions started to pour out, just like vodka from the bottle. Tears flowing as she drowned her sorrows into the words of the music.
"Shawndy, common and dance. You can't be sad for getting rid of such a horrible person."

"I'm not, but I can't seem to stop crying. I thought this would be a good time and it's turning out to be horrible. I don't think mixing booze with emotions are a good thing."

Trying to talk over the music without yelling didn't stop the two young men from ease dropping even if it were the odd word here and there. The blonde guy rose up to the occasion and thought this would be a great time to dig his heals into a dance.

"Excuse me, but I couldn't help but over hear your sad story. Your beautiful. Who ever this guy was let him stay there, you young lady need to rise above it. Come on let's dance and then I would love to buy you a drink."

Shawndy looked at Jennifer with a questionable gawk. She wiped her tears and without realizing grabbed the guy's hand allowing him to lead her to the dance floor.
Jennifer swept her hand forward telling her silently to go for it. She sat back down and ordered herself another drink.

"Put that on my bill please. This one is on me."

Jennifer looked up and met the most gorgeous blue eyes she had ever seen. She was shocked and not in a bad way.

"Care to join us at our table?"

"Sure." What else could she say when her body was being lured by such a handsome creature.
1243.title: They get drunk and ?...
